meanings.definition: Fribbles (noun): a frivolous or trivial matter
meanings.sent1: She always gets caught up in fribbles instead of focusing on her work.
meanings.sent2: The argument was just a fribbles about who should do the dishes.
meanings.sent3: The fribbles about what color to paint the walls lasted longer than the actual painting.
meanings.sent4: His obsession with fribbles was like chasing after a fleeting shadow.
meanings.sent5: The fribbles of gossip spread faster than wildfire in a dry forest.

meanings.definition: Fribbles (verb): to waste time or engage in trivial activities
meanings.sent1: Stop fribbling around and finish your homework!
meanings.sent2: They fribbled away the afternoon playing video games.
meanings.sent3: She fribbles so much that she never gets anything important done.
meanings.sent4: Fribbling through social media, he lost track of time.
meanings.sent5: The children fribbled happily in the park until sunset.

meanings.sent1: His fribbles jokes always make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: The meeting was full of fribbles discussions that led nowhere.
meanings.sent3: She wore a fribbles hat to the party, adding a touch of whimsy.
meanings.sent4: The fribbles excuses he made for being late were unbelievable.
meanings.sent5: The fribbles decorations at the event made it feel like a casual gathering.
